textList.text: Hello! In this experiment you will be asked to build a LEGO figure based on a virtual model in AR.
There will be 2 distinct ways for you to view the model, and you will be asked to do 2 tasks each.
One input method is going to use a hands-free mixture of facial expressions and head movement.
In the other method you can turn the model by using your hands and grabbing the model.
You can try out input methods before the task starts!
Input Method 1 (Hands-free): Move your head while raising your eyebrows to move the model.
Input Method 2: Move the model by grabbing it with your hands.
Push the white button to the right with your hand to try out moving the model!
